title: President Joe Biden's legacy as "Amtrak Joe"
shortDescription: As a known train fan, President Joe Biden's legacy is likely to be linked to America's rail expansions approved under the Infrastructure Jobs Act

title: When is Inauguration Day 2025? Trump set to be sworn in
shortDescription: Donald Trump is building his Cabinet quickly, but he still has nearly two months until his swearing-in. Here is a lookback at previous performers.

title: GOP senator opposes Donald Trump talk of using military in deportations
shortDescription: "If they send the Army into New York and you have 10,000 troops marching carrying semi-automatic weapons, I think it's a terrible image," Sen. Rand Paul said.

title: Who has Trump picked for his Cabinet? Here's what to know
shortDescription: Donald Trump named America First Policy Institute CEO Brooke Rollins for Secretary of Agriculture, closing the last open spot in his Cabinet.

title: Biden will pardon turkeys named Peach and Blossom in annual Thanksgiving tradition
shortDescription: The Minnesota turkeys President Joe Biden will pardon Monday are named Peach and Blossom.

title: Sarah McBride: Transgender bathroom bans at Capitol are 'attempt to misdirect'
shortDescription: Sarah McBride, the first openly transgender member of Congress, called a push for transgender bathroom bans an "attempt to misdirect" from real issues.

title: Donald Trump Jr is helping his father pick controversial cabinet
shortDescription: Donald Trump Jr. has emerged as the most influential Trump family member in the transition as the president-elect builds the most controversial cabinet in modern U.S. history.

title: Q&A with Donald Trump's press secretary pick, Karoline Leavitt
shortDescription: "I'm incredibly excited to speak on behalf of a president who has a mandate to deliver," Karoline Leavitt told Seacoastonline, part of the USA TODAY Network.

title: Trump's vow to cut federal government is finding a receptive audience
shortDescription: A new Trump administration readies the dismantling of a government it was elected to manage – the very objective his most ardent supporters demand.

title: Trump picks Brooke Rollins, a former policy aide, for agriculture secretary
shortDescription: At one point, Rollins was speculated to be a potential White House chief of staff for Trump.

title: Biden to pardon turkeys, but critics say it's 'wretched' tradition
shortDescription: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals has called for the end of the Thanksgiving turkey pardon tradition.

title: Israeli settlers set sights on Trump support for full control of West Bank
shortDescription: Some settlers prayed for Trump's victory before the election.

title: Trump considers ex-intelligence chief Grenell for Ukraine post
shortDescription: Trump could ultimately decide not to create a special envoy for the conflict in Ukraine, although he is strongly considering doing so, sources said.

title: Americans share hopes and fears for second Trump presidency
shortDescription: As President-elect Donald Trump prepares for the White House again, USA TODAY spoke with people across the country to discuss their hopes and fears.

title: AG pick Pam Bondi is 4th ex-Trump defense lawyer selected for DOJ
shortDescription: Former Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi is at least the fourth former or current Trump defense lawyer nominated for the Justice Department.

title: Sebastian Gorka, firebrand commentator, to return to Trump White House
shortDescription: Donald Trump named Sebastian Gorka, a controversial firebrand commentator who served in his first administration, to a national security role.

title: Trump picks Martin Makary of Johns Hopkins as FDA commissioner
shortDescription: The FDA is responsible for protecting the public health by ensuring the safety, efficacy, and security of human and veterinary drugs.

title: Trump taps Russell Vought, Project 2025 architect, to lead OMB
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump has picked Russell Vought, a key architect of Project 2025 and defender of strong presidential powers, as OMB director.

title: Dr. Dave Weldon, former Florida congressman, picked as CDC director
shortDescription: While in Congress, Weldon introduced a bill that would give responsibility for the nation's vaccine safety to an independent agency within the HHS.

title: See Trump's latest picks from Scott Bessent to Lori Chavez-DeRemer
shortDescription: Donald Trump has nominated Scott Bessent to be the next Treasury secretary and Russell Vought as Office of Management and Budget director.

title: Trump picks Scott Turner, ex-NFL player, as HUD secretary
shortDescription: Under Turner’s leadership, Opportunity Zones received over $50 billion in private investment, according to Trump.

title: Trump picks Dr. Janette Nesheiwat as US Surgeon General
shortDescription: Her book illuminates the transformative power of prayer and unwavering dedication to healing and service.

title: Trump taps GOP Rep. Lori Chavez-DeRemer to lead Labor Department
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump will nominate Rep. Lori Chavez-DeRemer, R-Ore., to lead the Labor Department.

title: Melania Trump appoints longtime aide as East Wing chief of staff
shortDescription: Trump said Harrison had a “strong understanding of White House operations,” and in her new role would “oversee and manage the East Wing’s team."
